UiControllerMain¶

class mnemosyne.libmnemosyne.ui_controller_main.UiControllerMain(component_manager)¶

A collection of logic used by the main Mnemosyne window and some related widgets. The logic related to the review process is split out in a separated controller class, to allow that to be swapped out easily.

activate()¶
Initialisation code called when the component is about to do actual work, and which can’t happen in the constructor, e.g. because components on which it relies have not yet been registered.
